A6020.changelog:
- Blacklisted google hotword service to fix mic issues
- Enabled audiosphere effect by default
- Fixed FM radio
- Fixed postprocessing daemon crashes
- Misc changes for infra

X00T.changelog:
- CLEAN FLASH REQUIRED (If you are coming from build with 4.4 kernel, i.e: before 09.04.2021 build) 

- Initial stable build with 4.19 kernel
- Added debloated ZenParts
- Fixed incorrect battery temperature, enjoy stock rom like charging.
- Updated most Hals and blobs from R tags (kona / 89xx)

- Fixed eis
- Fixed Zenmotions
- Fixed USB tethering

- Enforcing

X01AD.changelog:
- May 2021 Security Patch.
- Tune vibration Pattern.
- Add ASUS Doze.
- Add KCAL & KLAPSE in kernel.
- Enable Dex2oat usage for this device
- Miscellaneous fixes.

apollo.changelog:
- Initial build
- New refresh rate picker
- Adjusted some refresh rate settings
- Lots of good stuff

beryllium.changelog:
- Enable ZRAM (3Gb, lz4 compress algorithm)
- Enable H/W Composition
- Enable UBWC aligned framebuffer
- Enable Codec2 support
- Misc fixes and upstream changes.

Note:
- Update 2021-01-01 and earlier builds only with clean flash!

cmi.changelog:
! ! ! Firmware and vendor require update to V12.2.4.0.RJACNXM.

- Show FOD Animation settings
- Update WifiOverlay and TetheringOverlay
- wifi: Enable QPower and Deep sleep together
- Remove extra GBoard spacing
- Update CarrierConfig overlays
- More comfortable rounded corners

davinci.changelog: 22/05/2021- Improved power consumption- Switched to VantomKernel11/05/2021- Updated blobs from MIUI 21.4.28Notes:- Recommended firmware is MIUI 20.10.20 or higher (China Beta)- Minimum firmware is MIUI V12.0.5.0- Recommended recovery is the OFFICIAL TWRP

gauguin.changelog:
- Dynamic refresh rate fixes.
- Enable WFD.
- Fix audio issues.
- Misc updates

ginkgo.changelog: - Switched to sdclang 12 for kernel compilation

kebab.changelog: Update the May patch, add some simple functions, and continue to add

lmi.changelog:
- Firmware and vendor require V12.2.1.0.RJKCNXM.

- Device: https://github.com/ArrowOS-Devices/android_device_xiaomi_lmi/commits/arrow-11.0
- Blobs: https://github.com/ArrowOS-Devices/android_vendor_xiaomi_lmi/commits/arrow-11.0

mido.changelog:
Note:
- These are still going to continue on 3.18 builds only.
- Requests for 4.9 builds will be ignored.

This decision has been taken as per the equal no.of requests from both sides of the parties and concluded by the outcome of adverse performance affects.

monet.changelog:
- Kernel: Merged CAF tag LA.UM.9.12.r1-11000-SMxx50.0
- Cleanup props
- Misc fixes and upstream changes.

perseus.changelog:
- Enable ZRAM (3Gb, lz4 compress algorithm)
- Enable H/W Composition
- Enable UBWC aligned framebuffer
- Enable Codec2 support
- Misc fixes and upstream changes.

Note:
- It is required firmware part MIUI Q CN (Example V12.0.3.0.QEECNXM).

polaris.changelog:
- Enable ZRAM (3Gb, lz4 compress algorithm)
- Enable H/W Composition
- Enable UBWC aligned framebuffer
- Enable Codec2 support
- Misc fixes and upstream changes.

Note:
- Update 2021-01-01 and earlier builds only with clean flash!
- From now on it is required to be on Q firmware (11.0.3.0 global or more new)

raphael.changelog: This build comes with OSS Vendor and requires only the MIUI Q firmware.

sanders.changelog:
Clean flash must (kindly backup your data before flashing)
improved  performance
Enabled ZRAM by default
Tuned ZRAM for better performance
Compiled with hwui for better performance
Switched to Mad Kernel 2.0

surya.changelog:
- Fixed issues with the safety net.

Note:
- Required to be on android 11 f/w.
- A clean flash is mandatory while switching from old builds. Please backup your data beforehand!

sweet.changelog:
For installation information, refer to https://telegra.ph/Installation-of-ArrowOS-sweetsweetin---included-vendor-05-10

Latest build changelog:
- Fixed camera in WhatsApp Web scanner, and Google Duo
- Fixed front camera video resolution
- Switched to OSS camera provider

14/05/2021:
- Fixed blue/green tint on main camera on the 64MP sweetin variant
- Switched to Arrow kernel
- Enabled call recording on the AOSP dialer

12/05/2021
- Updated blobs from MIUI 12.0.15.0 Global
- Fixed infrarred blaster
- Cleaned up vendor (reduced zip size 100MB~)

11/05/2021
- Vendor is now included, more information at the link above
- Added DC dimming support

01/05/2021
- Switched to the Pixel Power HAL (libperfmgr)
- Improved idle drain
- Fixed headphone buttons
- Fixed yellow tint and improved display colors
- Added WiFi Display support
- Reworked the lights service
- Moved device specific settings into the settings homepage
- Reserved 250MB of space in each dynamic partition for installing addons
- Set default DPI to 392
- Reduced bootanimation start delay

14/04/2021:
- Initial official release

taimen.changelog:
Implement dc dimming
Repair DC dimming failure after restart
Fix UAF race
Fsync after block device writes
Fix color mode enhanced color loss

umi.changelog:
Firmware and vendor require lastest MIUI Stable V12.2.10

- Show FOD Animation settings
- Update WifiOverlay and TetheringOverlay
- wifi: Enable QPower and Deep sleep together
- Remove extra GBoard spacing
- Update CarrierConfig overlays
- More comfortable rounded corners

vayu.changelog:
- Misc changes
- Recommended firmware: MIUI 12.0.4.0 or 12.0.6.0

whyred.changelog:
• Upstream kernel to v4.4.268
• Misc changes
